description: Airing on Monday, January 5, 2015: First up on today's show, we speak with Carissa Christensen, Managing Partner at the Tauri Group, about bringing down the cost of space travel with reusable rockets. Plus, Stephen Cobb, from ESET North America, talks about whether or not companies can strike back against hackers. And Ben Clymer, the founder and executive editor of the online watch magazine Hodinkee, on how luxury watchmakers are approaching the smartwatch market.
